CREATEVM_DISKTYPE_RAW: RAW : Biggest but, fastest Disk type.
CREATEVM_DISKTYPE_VHDX: VHDX : Compatible Disk type with Hyper-V
MSG_VAR_DESC:
Imaginary found out that an unknown error occurred while startup process

Usually this happens if Imaginary's project folder location contains non-utf8 encoding folder or,
Serious problem happened.

Read Show Details.. for more information.
MSG_CREATEVM_DESC_TCG_ON:
Warning!

Guest Acceleration has been enabled,
This may not work with other OS.
MSG_CREATEVM_DESC_WINDOWS_WARN:
Imaginary found out that Guest OS Type is 'Windows',
But Disk Type neither 'RAW' nor 'VHDX'.

QCow2 Disk Type is not recommened in Windows and,
This Disk Type may slows down the performance of Guest System.

By Clicking OK, user agreed to this information and will continue.
MSG_CREATEVM_TITLE_MACOS_WARN: About Using Darwin/x86 based Operating System
MSG_CREATEVM_DESC_MACOS_WARN:
Imaginary found out that user is trying to install 'macOS',

Imaginary ONLY supports installing 'Windows' and 'Linux' based Operating Systems,
So it may not be able to Accelerate the performance of Guest System.

By Clicking OK, user agreed to this information and will continue.
MSG_CREATEVM_DESC_EXIST:
Guest System already exists,
Forcing to create VM may cause problem.
MSG_MAIN_METADATA_FAILED_JSON:
Cannot Read VM Metadata file.

JSON Decoding Error, Imaginary cannot read this JSON Format.
MSG_MAIN_METADATA_FAILED_NOFILEFOUND:
Cannot Read VM Metadata file.

File Cannot be found, Imaginary cannot find metadata.
MSG_MAIN_METADATA_FAILED_PERMISSION:
Cannot Read VM Metadata file.

No Permission, Imaginary does not have permission to read metadata.
MSG_MAIN_METADATA_FAILED_SYSTEM:
Cannot Read VM Metadata file.

SystemError, An error occurred in the system.
MSG_MAIN_METADATA_FAILED_INCOMPATIBLE:
Cannot Read VM Metadata file.

Incompatible File Format, Imaginary can only read ZIP and JSON.
MSG_UPDATE_FOUND_DESC_2: , Click 'Show Details..' to read update log.
MSG_UPDATE_DEV_VERSION_DESC2:
버전보다 더 높은 버전을 사용하고 있습니다,
이 버전은 매우 불안정하며, 버그가 자주 발생합니다.
MSG_INFO_LANGUAGE_SAVE_FAIL_SYSTEM:
Failed to Save Language Data

SystemError, An Error occurred in the system.
MSG_INFO_LANGUAGE_SAVE_FAIL_PERMISSION:
Failed to Save Language Data

No Permission, Imaginary does not have enough permission to write data.
MSG_INFO_LANGUAGE_SAVE_FAIL_NOFILEFOUND:
Failed to Save Language Data

File Cannot be found, Imaginary cannot find language data file.
